subject: Basketball (College)
Statistics
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Smith, who died Saturday, was the most prominent early proponent of possession-based analysis, which is now standard operating procedure in college basketball and the N.B.A.
snippet: Smith, who died Saturday, was the most prominent early proponent of possession-based analysis, which is now standard operating procedure in college basketball and the N.B.A.
